## Testing tar_quarto

This document is a toy example for tar_quarto.

## Assumptions

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r, label="assumptions"}

# values = tar_load(values)
values = list(beta = c(0,1))
values |>
  as_tibble() |>
  gt(caption = "Study Assumptions") # I may need a full set of assumptions in a tibble as a target
  # tab_header(title = "Study Assumptions") 
```

## Table
